snippet: A major Colombian drug trafficking suspect surrendered to United States drug agents in Aruba and was flown to New York, where he faces criminal charges.
abstract: Colombian authorities say Jose Antonio Calle, major Colombian drug trafficking suspect, has surrendered to United States drug agents and has been flown to New York, where he faces criminal charges.
lead_paragraph: A major Colombian drug trafficking suspect surrendered to United States drug agents in Aruba and was flown to New York, where he faces criminal charges.

headline.main: Colombia: Trafficking Suspect Is Said to Surrender to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Trafficking Suspect Is Said to Surrender to the U.S.
